statements: SELECT * FROM employees_training ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, training_type FROM employees_training WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employees_training WHERE training_type = 'Onboarding';
SELECT training_type, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance_score FROM employees_training GROUP BY training_type;
SELECT employee_id, completion_status FROM employees_training WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees_training WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_type, training_date FROM employees_training WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT training_type, COUNT(*) AS total_trainings FROM employees_training GROUP BY training_type HAVING total_trainings > 5;
SELECT employee_id, training_type, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM employees_training GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM employees_training WHERE training_type LIKE 'S%' AND completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY performance_score DESC, training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress;
SELECT employee_id, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceData ORDER BY last_review_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, average_performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceData WHERE average_performance_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT DISTINCT training_module_id FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress;

SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, progress_percentage, completion_date, performance_rating FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE employee_id = 1 AND progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY completion_date DESC;

SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, progress_percentage, completion_date, performance_rating FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;

SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, progress_percentage, completion_date, performance_rating FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 20 AND performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY employee_id, training_module_id;

SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, average_performance_rating, training_duration_minutes, last_review_date FROM EmployeePerformanceData WHERE training_duration_minutes > 180 ORDER BY average_performance_rating DESC, last_review_date ASC;

SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, progress_percentage, completion_date, performance_rating FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE completion_date < '2022-06-30' AND performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY training_module_id, progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_progress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, completion_date FROM employee_training_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE overall_performance_rating >= 4.0;
SELECT employee_id, last_performance_review_date FROM employee_performance ORDER BY last_performance_review_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, performance_improvement_areas FROM training_environment_analysis WHERE analysis_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_progress WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, overall_performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE overall_performance_rating >= 4.0;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, training_module_id FROM training_environment_analysis WHERE performance_improvement_areas LIKE '%communication%';

SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, completion_date FROM employee_training_progress JOIN training_environment_analysis ON employee_training_progress.employee_id = training_environment_analysis.employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, overall_performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE last_performance_review_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM Training WHERE duration_hours > 50;
SELECT training_name, duration_hours FROM Training ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_id, progress_percentage FROM TrainingProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 30;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT training_name, duration_hours FROM Training WHERE duration_hours > 10;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT training_name, progress_percentage FROM TrainingProgress INNER JOIN Training ON TrainingProgress.training_id = Training.training_id;
SELECT employee_name, training_name, performance_score FROM Employee INNER JOIN PerformanceData ON Employee.employee_id = PerformanceData.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_progress;
SELECT employee_id, progress, completion_date FROM employee_progress ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hiring_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT skill_name, skill_description FROM skills WHERE skill_name = 'SQL';
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_courses ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT skill_name, skill_description FROM skills WHERE skill_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description, start_date FROM training_courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, hiring_date, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hiring_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_course_id, progress, completion_date FROM employee_progress WHERE progress >= 50;
